EmailTemplate.name: RE: Turbonomic Intro and the MLB All Star Game (1496669384.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: Turbonomic Intro and the MLB All Star Game (1496669384.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - - 90 Clean DocumentEmail false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Ron, With the large investment the infrastructure team has made in virtualization at FAMU, I was hoping that my team and I could get the chance to show you why large companies like BMC, EMC and HPE choose to use Turbonomic to increase application performance while also allowing them to realize the true capacity of their infrastructures. To quote Scott Crowder, “”Once we brought Turbonomic into our infrastructure and turned it on we actually saw a 25% increase in overall capacity. Not only that - the performance went through the roof.” See more in the video below. Cloud Economics with BMC | A Turbonomic Success Story <[[http://info.turbonomic.com/ol/jE5YdMHJKVxQsRpg5uiMMKvivTDUe5u9qKgwWbq2n59ziQVuYOPLdRGphcBWFZZvNa%2DaCAZNQsIylEpLFL3FOoVJ%5FqhcAk%2DhTzTtlKmUf4xCfLFh%5FNdo66m2lmMKp5uXm1iRWQkLWGV%2DZVuwXYpwghXJKalxUwi3zlKTGJ0nxCo%5Fo60G8Z6gTYSdql6620%5Fo2wCUGGVUsPjJ00iSKKxzoeRQtnh20UkKStmjzS%5FukYUomHUC%2DNkltBU%5F79J4DZpuxymQXHazvY71afxUepinlLD%2Dr8R7NkoGo7d%5FeGP7P1m%2DVp6ZTg9kyEHVgjMQH2pXKz8DOOR%5Ftjmim25gVMk7QhiekStxkXkj4qRT96qothamPH%5FrCHXzoh2N0QuIA9A7kUbDmNIV4hDgCw7vyMFza3L0BPPsjlS0YcnUvnIVE6EPG4Y%2C/j01QeM3JL1lNoVdlsbPWNrz%5FnTrOdZWhuPJ%2DBvqpwMot1l1scencd1fmjNZeD90xaeaLBU8VEJ9vzwFRGfPYc44N6udYBgy9SnbwhqeXeIRaeflnydNj8Kaq1WkG59%2DPkROTBEQaf2Vjb1vPcYoBrwftE5UvVzuX9lmUcNUBmSE6h5EKxZmxd5W113rlp2bV%5FT3WE0Nz6JKYwGmvFbBfvP4As3QjrQMCOLPS]]> I was hoping that the video above might arise enough interest from you so that you would be open to an introduction to Turbonomic to see if it can provide similar benefits to you and the team at FAMU. If so, please let me know and I would be happy to arrange a time that is best for you. I promise to respect your time and process for reviewing new platforms if you so choose to agree to an introduction. The offer below still stands! Best regards, James From: James Wilcox Sent: Wednesday, May 31, 2017 9:39 AM To: 'ronald.henry@famu.edu' <ronald.henry@famu.edu> Subject: Turbonomic Intro and the MLB All Star Game Hi Ron, I wanted to let you know that we are running a special promotion for meeting with us over the next month. If you complete an introductory meeting with Turbonomic before June 23rd, we will enter you in a raffle to win a trip for two (2) to the 2017 MLB All-Star Game in Miami, Florida from July 9 - 12, 2017. Turbonomic’s autonomic workload management platform frees up operations, infrastructure, architecture and engineering teams from manual management and planning within any cloud or on-prem environment, enabling you to work more effectively together as you pursue strategic initiatives. We’d like to show you how - and give you an opportunity to watch the best baseball players in the league come together for an unforgettable event. If you’d like to be entered, you can visit this page <[[http://mkto-sjp0104.com/ol/jE1TcMTPLVxQsRpg5uiMMKvivTDUe5u9qKgwWbq2n59ziQVuYOPLdRGphcBWFZZvNa%2DaCAZNQsIylEpLFL3FOoVJ%5FqhPBE%2DzVD%2DxiKTUfZRud7V%2DyY9k%2D73jzWkB943El0TYG05TbUVdfAC1R6YZ1jHsAKQKDS6d%5FiPDAqEzng8Ejo0w0cOSSZqj1Vej7Gjywj2jEHRpyuWT42aPXM1Qv%2DZUk3UW4mk8R%2DvMxBiV75sLpQgipfVZhzE88NtIOcs6sEqIUwL33rfVWuw8TqaLwrumjdUbPh06oZMsdjfFKGyeGrPKIDZ32T3drzg3aA1GECljBLY7kELUrUJDVcEMSBKtmjABzG0s5K9d%2DYH0mArARUnjHQL8hges%5FlySIYIL4FyrrI4szAuKbF6ouak%2C/j09SdsDLK1lNoVdlsbPWJbvomjvDc4qrt7kzH%5Fryx9081gZ9feGAPVn7jcFfHZ5%5FaeCQCkwaAIBgnxlKFr2daJRQ6bAOKgTgfn6tprXPfY9Bf7t%2D1cIv%5FKeonTIjp9GA313ABQIdVHB%2DKQOFeboyjTjpM5VuWAqR%5F3rWNJ5mzg5OiLYQ6Yakdu7m40aB3n7MzzS4YWlpwdWC%2DlqPD7VGjYcXpXEG7AR1cPbk6zr%2Dl%2D4IvA0NwP9upClI3%5F1%2DFc4tszfMDQA%2C]]>, or just let me know and I will work with you directly to schedule our meeting and put you into the raffle. Best regards, Going to Cisco Live?
